mapper.sql: SELECT DISTINCT p.id product_id, p.name product_name, p.description product_description, di.place_name, f.id file_id, f.file_name, f.save_file_name FROM product p INNER JOIN display_info di ON p.id = di.product_id INNER JOIN product_image pi ON p.id = pi.product_id INNER JOIN file f ON pi.file_id = f.id WHERE p.sales_start <= CURDATE() AND p.sales_end >= CURDATE() AND pi.type = 1
